artist: Artist: Fly NYC , et al.; Author: Joe Biel; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, red and white letterpress text and blue photographic image of a group of bicyclists printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 39 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Bipedal, By Pedal! Experiences & thoughts around the Critical Mass bicycle movement!
